original: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṁ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavana dhamma sākacchā paripucchā sīla samādāne indriyesu gutta dvāra tā bhojane mattaññu tā pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogā uti

original: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavanam pe pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogā ti

original: Hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavanam pe pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
analyzed: paratas ca ghosaḥ yonisaḥ ca manasikāroti

original: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: paratas ca ghosaḥ yonisaḥ ca manasikāro no ca vata re vattabbe
suttassa pamattassa muṭṭha ssatissa a sampajānassa dhamma abhisamayaḥ ti
